wisdom_entries.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom_entries.author: Socrates

wisdom_entries.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
wisdom_entries.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom_entries.text: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
wisdom_entries.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom_entries.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
wisdom_entries.author: Dalai Lama

wisdom_entries.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
wisdom_entries.author: John Lennon

wisdom_entries.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
wisdom_entries.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom_entries.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
wisdom_entries.author: Buddha

wisdom_entries.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
wisdom_entries.author: Steve Jobs

wisdom_entries.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
wisdom_entries.author: Buddha

wisdom_entries.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
wisdom_entries.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom_entries.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
wisdom_entries.author: Socrates

wisdom_entries.text: Where there is love there is life.
wisdom_entries.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom_entries.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
wisdom_entries.author: Theodore Roosevelt
